word_mean_info__list.difference: 常和动态动词连用，指“从……上面越过”或“横越”；表静态时，指“在彼处”。
侧重从一端穿到另一端。
指沿着一条直线在水平方向上运动。一般表动态，有时也与静态动词连用。
指“从……的一边到另一边”，强调横过，多与动态动词连用。

word_group.brief_definition: 成功应付, 相处, 关系融洽；离开
赞同…的观点, 服从遵守…；与...一起
在以后某一时刻；在某一阶段；稍后
合着磁带或唱片演奏；假装合作

bilingual.source: Cut out the puzzle along the dark lines.
Let's take a walk along the beach.
bilingual.target: 让我们沿着海滩散步吧。
我们有时沿着海滩散步。
游客可以沿着海滩散步。

bilingual.source: She liked running out along the shore.
Go along Long Street and it's on the left.
This time, Yasmin ran along by the river.
bilingual.target: 这次，雅思敏沿着河边跑。

yingyinNormal.en: What is it? Current pulse rates at our monitoring stations. All along the San Andreas fault.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么了？这是我们监测站的磁脉冲率。都沿着圣安德烈亚斯的断层线。

yingyinNormal.en: Stand back. Mommy Pig is skiing along the road. Everyone is in the coach, chasing after Mommy Pig.
yingyinNormal.zh: 往后退。猪妈妈一直沿着路滑走了。大家都在大巴车上，追赶猪妈妈。

yingyinNormal.en: Five legions to block Deadwind Pass. Another ten here, here, and here, along Redridge Mountains.
yingyinNormal.zh: 五个军团封锁逆风小径，这里另外十个，在这里，还有这里，沿着赤脊山脉。

yingyinNormal.en: What you do is you just drag your nets along the bottom. On a good day, you can catch over a hundred pounds of shrimp.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你只需要沿着海底拖你的网，在一个好天气，你一次就能捕到上百磅的虾。

yingyinNormal.en: After paying your respects at the Big Buddha seek a little enlightenment along the Wisdom Path a trail dedicated to the centuries-old Buddhist scripture, the Heart Sutra.
yingyinNormal.zh: 参拜大佛后，您还可以沿着心经简林走走，这是一条以世代相传的佛教经文心经而建的步行径。

yingyinNormal.en: By day, the charming boutiques and cafes hum with shoppers, and by night the bars along Carnaby Street are packed with patrons enjoying pre-show drinks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 日间，那些精致的小商店和咖啡厅内聚满顾客，而在晚上，沿着卡纳比街的酒吧则挤满了在欣赏表演前到来的食客。

yingyinNormal.en: Run along, I have a crab to cook.
yingyinNormal.zh: 走开，我要烧死这头蟹。

yingyinNormal.en: Tell me what you know or move along. No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要么告诉我你知道什么要么滚蛋。不。

yingyinNormal.en: How's Monica coming along with her vows?
yingyinNormal.zh: 莫妮卡写得怎么样？

yingyinNormal.en: The next baby should be along in a minute.
yingyinNormal.zh: 下一个孩子马上就出来。

yingyinNormal.en: Racism hurts Whites along with Minorities.
yingyinNormal.zh: 种族主义对白人和少数族裔都是伤害。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: Hazel. You're just along for the ride, okay?
yingyinNormal.zh: 黑兹尔，你就更不靠边了。

yingyinNormal.en: Gender inequality harms men along with women.
yingyinNormal.zh: 性别不平等对男性和女性都没好处。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: It sure does, boy. Why don't you scurry along?
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然了，孩子。你为啥还不快滚呢？
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water》

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry, who should be along in a what, now?
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，谁要出来？刚才你说啥？

yingyinNormal.en: Only to find, whoopsie, we don't all get along.
yingyinNormal.zh: 结果呢，哎呀，他们关系并不好。

yingyinNormal.en: My apologies, you've been sitting in it all along.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不好意思，你们一直都坐对了地方。

yingyinNormal.en: We've made some mistakes along the way. Some, very recently.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些年我们犯了不少错误，甚至包括现在。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm thinking more along the lines of a constitutional democracy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在考虑实施立宪民主。

yingyinNormal.en: Come along, Mindy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 走吧，敏迪。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 成功应付；相处；关系融洽；离开

examination_example.sentence: This process, <highlight>along</highlight> with employees reviewing the contracts, is faster and more accurate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个过程，以及员工审查合同的工作变得更快，更准确。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Along</highlight> with Singapore, other governments and mega-corporations are beginning to establish their own guidelines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与新加坡一样，其他政府和大型企业也开始制定自己的指导方针。

examination_example.sentence: Many people talked of the 288,000 new jobs, <highlight>along</highlight> with the drop in the unemployment rate to 6.1 percent, as good news.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多人将288000个新工作岗位以及失业率降至6.1%视为好消息。

sense_info_list.en: in a line next to something long

examination_example.sentence: The future comes at us like empty bottles <highlight>along</highlight> an unstoppable and nearly infinite conveyor belt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 未来向我们走来，就像沿着一条不可阻挡且似乎无止尽的传送带流转的空瓶。

examination_example.sentence: This is why decisions split <highlight>along</highlight> ideological lines are so easily dismissed as unjust.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就是为什么按照意识形态划分的决策如此容易被视为不公正的原因。

sense_info_list.en: to refer to the passage of time or the making of progress

examination_example.sentence: He had to suffer many disappointments and rejections <highlight>along</highlight> the way, but these made him all the more determined to succeed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一路上他不得不遭受许多失望和拒绝，但这些使他更加坚定了成功的决心。

examination_example.sentence: I want to share these old truths I've learned <highlight>along</highlight> the way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想分享这些我一路上学到的古老真理。

examination_example.sentence: This forces users to be more conscious of their role in passing <highlight>along</highlight> information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这迫使用户更加留意自己在信息传递中扮演的角色。

examination_example.sentence: One oft-debated cure for this labor shortage remains as implausible as it's been all <highlight>along</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个经常被争论的解决劳动力短缺的方法，仍像一直以来一样令人难以置信。

examination_example.sentence: Think about how tough it is to get together 15 people, much less 50, who all get <highlight>along</highlight> perfectly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想想看，15个人聚在一起有多难，更别说50个人了，他们都相处得很好。

word_usage.usage: along作副词时，常与表示动态动词搭配，如：I was just walking along singing to myself. 我独自唱着歌向前走着。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 成功应付；相处；关系融洽；离开

sense_info_list.en: in a line next to something long

examination_example.sentence: Parents can comment <highlight>along</highlight> the way and then explain the message at the end.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 家长可以一路评论，然后在最后解释信息。

examination_example.sentence: They collect on your shoes when you walk <highlight>along</highlight> sidewalks, public toilet floors and even office carpets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你走在人行道，公共厕所的地板，甚至办公室的地毯上时，它们会聚集在你的鞋子上。

sense_info_list.en: in or into company with others; with one
moving in a constant direction on a path or any more or less horizontal surface

examination_example.sentence: However, they're also learning other things <highlight>along</highlight> the way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，他们也在学习其他的东西。

sense_info_list.en: at a particular place on a road, river, or others

sample.mean: v. 减轻；减弱；使减轻；使减弱；减小；减少；消除
adv. 在国外；到国外；向四方；广泛地；未击中目标；出错；在室外；到室外；盛行；行动自由
adv. 往远方地；遥远地；在田野；在野外
adv. 重新地
v. 改正；修正；改善（土壤）的结构；修复
adv. 相距；相隔；在一边地；与主体分离地；粉碎地；成零碎地；分居；与众不同地；感情上彼此隔阂；有别于其他地
n. 公寓套房; 一套公寓房间；一套公寓；公寓大楼；豪华公寓套房
adv. 每个；就（群体中）每个而论

word_usage.usage:
get along with sb表示“和某人相处”。
示例：He could not get along with anybody. 
他跟谁都合不来。

along with可以表示“连同”“和...一起”“随着”。连接前后两个主语时，谓语动词应和前面的那个主语保持一致。
示例：A woman along with two children has come.
一位妇女带着两个孩子已经来了。

go along with可以表示“赞同”“支持”。
示例：I can't go along with your view.
我不能赞同你的观点。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指"从…的一边到另一边", 强调横过, 多与动态动词连用。
指沿着一条直线在水平方向上运动。<highlight>一般表动态</highlight>, 有时也与静态动词连用。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in or into company with others; with one

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Along</highlight> with old classics like "carrots give you night vision", one of the most well-worn phrases of tired parents everywhere is that breakfast is the most important meal of the day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了“吃胡萝卜能增进夜间视力”这样的老话之外，天下疲惫不堪的父母说得最多的一句话，就是早餐是一天当中最重要的一餐了。

examination_example.sentence: Levels of outdoor pollution have grown rapidly <highlight>along</highlight> with rapid growth in industry and transportation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着工业和交通的快速增长，室外污染水平迅速上升。

examination_example.sentence: The program will offer patients several bags of food prescribed for their condition, <highlight>along</highlight> with intensive training in how to cook it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该项目将为患者提供几袋针对其病情开出的食物，以及如何烹饪食物的强化培训。

sense_info_list.en: in a line next to something long

examination_example.sentence: As a child, I spent some time living with anumeric people, the Pirahã who live <highlight>along</highlight> the banks of the black Maici River.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 孩提时，我和(文化中)没有数字的人——皮拉哈人生活过一段时间，他们居住在黑色的迈西河。

examination_example.sentence: There are numberless hunter-gatherers in Amazonia, living <highlight>along</highlight> branches of the world's largest river tree.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亚马逊河流域有无数的狩猎采集者，生活在世界上最大的河树的分支上。

examination_example.sentence: It's about an hour outside Seoul, built on former tidal flats <highlight>along</highlight> the Yellow Sea.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该城距首尔大约一小时车程，建在黄海沿岸原来是潮滩的地方。

sense_info_list.en: moving in a constant direction on a path or any more or less horizontal surface

examination_example.sentence: Attitudes toward new technologies often fall <highlight>along</highlight> generational lines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对新技术的态度通常会随着年龄的增长而逐渐变差。

word_usage.usage:
along with可以表示“连同”“和...一起”“随着”。连接前后两个主语时，谓语动词应和前面的那个主语保持一致。
示例：A woman along with two children has come.
一位妇女带着两个孩子已经来了。

get along with sb表示“和某人相处”。
示例：He could not get along with anybody. 
他跟谁都合不来。

go along with可以表示“赞同”“支持”。
示例：I can't go along with your view.
我不能赞同你的观点。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指"从…的一边到另一边"，强调横过，多与动态动词连用。
指沿着一条直线在水平方向上运动。<highlight>一般表动态</highlight>，有时也与静态动词连用。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 成功应付；相处；关系融洽；离开

sense_info_list.en: in a line next to something long

examination_example.sentence: Somewhere <highlight>along</highlight> the way, however, I lost touch with my creative self.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而在沿途中的某一个地方，我和那个具有创造力的自己断了联系。

examination_example.sentence: I find a clean mountain, with toilets at camps and <highlight>along</highlight> the paths.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我找到了一座干净的山，营地里和小路沿线都有洗手间。

examination_example.sentence: It sits on the seaside <highlight>along</highlight> the South Coast Highway.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它位于南海岸高速公路沿线的海边。

sense_info_list.en: in or into company with others; with one

examination_example.sentence: We simply didn't get <highlight>along</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们只是单纯地合不来。

examination_example.sentence: The mirrors are controlled by a computer that directs them to turn <highlight>along</highlight> with the sun throughout the day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些镜子由一台电脑控制，它可以引导它们全天跟随太阳转动。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in a line next to something long

examination_example.sentence: In some cities of China, you'll get fined if you don't walk <highlight>along</highlight> the crosswalk while crossing the road.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在中国的一些城市，如果你过马路时不走人行道，你会被罚款。

examination_example.sentence: The views <highlight>along</highlight> the marathon route are beautiful．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 马拉松路线沿途的风景很美。

examination_example.sentence: The knowledge and skills that you will need will be picked up <highlight>along</highlight> the way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你将会在一路上学习你所需要的知识和技能。

sense_info_list.en: in or into company with others; with one

examination_example.sentence: There are programs that provide four weeks of paid jobs <highlight>along</highlight> with training.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有提供四周带薪工作以及培训的项目。

examination_example.sentence: We get <highlight>along</highlight> with each other well, but she is asking me to do things for her all the time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们相处得很好，但她一直要求我为她做事。

examination_example.sentence: They just followed the first student blindly and went <highlight>along</highlight> with him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们只是盲目地跟着第一个学生，跟着他走。

examination_example.sentence: This can lead to the mistaken belief—the knowledge we found was part of what we knew all <highlight>along</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可能导致错误的信念——我们所发现的知识是我们一直知道的一部分。

word_usage.usage:
get along with sb表示“和某人相处”。
示例：He could not get along with anybody. 
他跟谁都合不来。

along with可以表示“连同”“和...一起”“随着”。连接前后两个主语时，谓语动词应和前面的那个主语保持一致。
示例：A woman along with two children has come.
一位妇女带着两个孩子已经来了。

go along with可以表示“赞同”“支持”。
示例：I can't go along with your view.
我不能赞同你的观点。
